snippet: John Duffy of 3C Interactive says he asks job candidates to describe what their first months on the job would be like, partly to “learn what their expectations are, and where they think we’re at.”
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features interview with 3C Interactive chief executive John Duffy discussing his management technique.
lead_paragraph: John Duffy of 3C Interactive says he asks job candidates to describe what their first months on the job would be like, partly to “learn what their expectations are, and where they think we’re at.”
